review: Dr Sudhir id highly dedicated, ******* *** professional in neonatal care and pediatrics.  my wife had twin pregnancy and had to undergo emergency surgery in the midnight ( pre term delivery 28 week ). Before my wife was taken to OT he reached hospital and given mental support to us as it was really panic situation for us. Babies were 800 gm and 1200 gm respectively and He has taken care of them like his own , given mental support to us also explained and asked our consent for all the procedures which were performed on babies. now babies are healthy and they are weighing 3.6 kg and 5.6 kg after 8 months. I recommend dr for neonatology and pediatrics and he is a down to earth man.

context: Neonates,Neonatology -preterm follow up,Pediatric Vaccinations,Pediatrics Critical Care,
review: *** ** *** *** ****** **** highly specialized with preterm and new born babies handling. We had our baby treated by doctor. our baby was extremely premature 24 weeker(weighing only 610 gms). Doctor himself came to Hassan and transported baby all the way to Bangalore. Very Happy to share that our baby is now weighing 2 kgs. Have visited many countries and consulted doctors. Felt very surprised to see all international standard  techniques used by him as part of his treatment methodology. He gives very good attention and proactive. During our visits, we have also seen many cases of premature babies, babies with low birth weight, babies with severe infections are being treated successfully by doctor. Would highly recommend this doctor for babies and kids.
********* ********* *** good response from doctor                                                                            explanation of treatment is very well on time response is good
